creator.description: Labels as decided by a perfect brain.

locales.description: This poster is familiar with the ways and kingdoms of the beasts of the sky. Even seagulls will respect them for their wisdom and birdlore.
locales.name: Bird Lord

locales.description: This poster's appetites are loudly stated and publicly sated. Shameful.
locales.name: Intemperate

locales.description: Label description.
locales.name: Label Display Name

locales.description: This user understands and enjoys the balletic violence, the physical theater, the kinetic poetry of the spot of kings.
locales.name: Grapple Appreciator

locales.description:
Is this user a potato who dreams of being a gargoyle, or a gargoyle who would be tasty with some sour cream and chives, and maybe a bit of cheese?

Find out at TGI Fridays!
locales.name: The Potato Gargoyle

locales.description: This user has been defeated by rem postes.
locales.name: Victim of rem postes

locales.description: This user is familiar with the rich smooth taste of Pepsi Grand and can name each flavor note as well as who and when it was added to the Pepsi Grand mother cauldron.
locales.name: Pepsi Grand Grandmaster

locales.description: This user walks the seven-fold path of Mandy Patinkin. While they may have not, or ever will, achieve a full patanktheosis, they should be honored for their dedication.
locales.name: The Path of Patinkin

locales.description: This user stands against Skub and is prepared to take direct action should peaceful avenues fail.
locales.name: Anti-Skub Aktion Corp.

locales.description: This user believes in the mission and vision of Skub and will purse making it reality.
locales.name: Pro-Skub Partisan

locales.description: This user has dreamt of Bluesky functions. This vision has doomed their spirit to the Fourth Great Mod War in the astral planes.
locales.name: Dream Warrior of the Astral Plane

locales.description: This poster has sat down and experienced the pain only Mr. Belvedere and other curse-bearers can know.
locales.name: Bearer of Belvedere's Curse

locales.description: This user has learned of the Terrible Secret of Space. Their mind is no longer their own, beware their starthoughts.
locales.name: The Terrible Secret of Space

locales.description: This user has borne witness to the terrible secrets of the forest or the stars above it. They have seen the lights dancing in the nothingness and may be entitled to compensation.
locales.name: UFO or Cryptid Victim

locales.description:
Born in a mountain.
Raised in a cave.
Postin' and Truckin' is all that they crave.
(Poster is capable of driving a 17+ wheeler.)
locales.name: Truck Lord

locales.description: WARNING: This poster regularly produces sublime, perfect, thoughts.
locales.name: Perfect Angel of the Mind

locales.description: This is not a judgment one way or another, just a statistical analysis of likely future events.
locales.name: Will Probably Kill Again

locales.description: This pardner follows the cowboy code.
locales.name: Cowboy

locales.description: A scamp! They are running around, performing mischiefs.
locales.name: Scamp

locales.description: A true rascal! Prepare yourself for their shenanigans!
locales.name: Rascal
